item.description:
A new theater just opened up in Hartford called Spotlight Theatre.  I checked it out this weekend and it was pretty nice.  It has a great restaurant and bar, comfortable seating and easy parking.  (Street parking is free was ample when I was there on Sunday).  There's also $2 garage parking if there are no spots on the street. 

They haven't posted their movie schedule for the weekend yet, but let's welcome them to the area by meeting for dinner and a movie.  I'll update with movie information as soon as they publish it. 

 

Dinner 5:45 pm

Movie Life of Pi 6:55 and The Hobbit 3D 7:20

 

We'll all grab dinner together at the theater and then split up to see either movie.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the restaurant in the lobby of the theater.
item.name: Dinner and a Movie at the new Spotlight Theater - Life of Pi and The Hobbit
